properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 4 at 3:36AM EST until January 5 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Western Greenbrier County.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow squalls, with a sudden increase in
wind and decrease in visibility in snow and blowing snow are
possible this evening. Blowing snow will continue into Sunday
morning, as the snow diminishes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
